articles.author: James Pearce
articles.title: Liverpool’s Mac Allister and Szoboszlai show the benefit of early work in the transfer window - The Athletic
articles.description: Liverpool's squad still needs additions but the two midfield signings the club have brought in are already making an impact
articles.content:
With so much talk about the pressing need for further reinforcements, here was a reminder about the injection of quality Jurgen Klopp has already added to his Liverpool squad this summer.
